title: Chapter 1887 - Each Displaying His Divine Abilities
body:
Chapter 1887 - Each Displaying His Divine Abilities

In the face of an imminent crisis, Su Yi didn’t hesitate to use the Book of Karma as a shield.

Fuck! Again? The Book of Karma longed to curse him out.

Boom!

One world after another came crashing down, making the Book of Karma tremble.

Immediately afterward, resplendent Buddhist light burst forth. Countless Buddhas' eyes bulged with fury, and their voices boomed like spring thunder as they shot out of the divine flames and attacked.

Terrifying, destructive power swept forth like raging tidal waves. Before one wave had even fallen, another arose.

The Book of Karma wouldn’t be able to block this much longer, but Su Yi didn’t panic. On the contrary, he was a bit irritated. He sighed, “You’re an unparalleled figure working beneath the Dipankara Buddha, yet you dare not fight me with your true strength. It’s truly disappointing.”

That’s right. He held the bald donkey’s methods in disdain!

Jia Yun set a divine formation right from the get-go, so he obviously lacked courage. His schemes ran too deep.

“How could I possibly have resorted to this if not for the divine misfortune covering the Immortal Realm?” Jia Yun said calmly. “Of course, you needn’t let this spur you to negativity. You’re far from comparable to other...
original_title: Chapter 1887 - Each Displaying His Divine Abilities
